body.raw:
comment_: These are extra parameter for filter data. if user and driver than same id will be passed in user and driver_id fro fetch accepted or rejected trips of that driver.
driver_id=684a612fec8cdf10c246e427
driver_response=accepted
vehicle_details=<vehicle id>
trip_status=scheduled

item.name: Get Access token by Refresh Token

request.description:
Generated from cURL: curl --location --request POST 'http://localhost:5000/api/users' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--data-raw '{
    "username": "john_doe",
    "email": "john@example.com",
    "fullname": "Johnathan Doe",
    "name": "John",
    "postal_code": "123456",
    "contact_no": "9876543210",
    "profile": "https://example.com/profile.jpg",
    "password": "Test@1234",
    "type": "customer",
    "terms_conditions": true
}'

Generated from cURL: curl --location --request POST 'http://localhost:5000/api/users' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--data-raw '{
    "username": "john_doe",
    "email": "john@example.com",
    "fullname": "Johnathan Doe",
    "name": "John",
    "postal_code": "123456",
    "contact_no": "9876543210",
    "profile": "https://example.com/profile.jpg",
    "password": "Test@1234",
    "type": "customer",
    "terms_conditions": true
}'

Generated from cURL: curl --location --request PUT 'http://localhost:5000/api/users/USER_ID_HERE' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--data-raw '{
    "username": "john_updated",
    "email": "john_updated@example.com",
    "fullname": "John Updated",
    "name": "Johnny",
    "postal_code": "654321",
    "contact_no": "9876500000",
    "profile": "https://example.com/profile-new.jpg",
    "password": "NewPass@1234",
    "type": "driver",
    "terms_conditions": true
}'
